BaseApiResponse.description: Base response object denoting success, or failure with a reason, for an endpoint.

Integration_BaseIntegrationWSRequest.description: Base request object for integration operations.

Integration_InitiateOAuthWSRequest.description: Request object for initiating OAuth authentication flow.

Integration_InitiateOAuthWSResponse.description: Response object containing OAuth redirect URL.

Integration_RefreshGoogleAccessTokenWSRe.description: Request object for refreshing Google access token.

refreshUserToken.description: Whether to refresh the user token

Integration_RefreshGoogleAccessTokenWSRe.description: Response object containing refreshed Google access token.

Integration_RevokeGoogleDriveAccessWSReq.description: Request object for revoking Google Drive access permissions.

revokeUserAccount.description: If set to true, revokes Rhombus Systems access to a user's Google Drive account, otherwise revokes Rhombus Systems access to the org's shared Google Drive account

Integration_UpdateBoxIntegrationWSReques.description: Request object for updating Box file storage integration settings.

Integration_UpdateDropboxIntegrationWSRe.description: Request object for updating Dropbox integration settings.

Integration_UpdateGoogleIntegrationV2WSR.description: Request object for updating Google V2 integration settings with enhanced features.

Integration_UpdateGoogleIntegrationWSReq.description: Request object for updating Google integration settings.

Integration_UpdateOffice365IntegrationWS.description: Request object for updating Office 365 integration settings.

Integration_UpdateOrgIntegrationsWSRespo.description: Response object for updating organization integrations.

authError.description: Whether an authentication error occurred during update

failedGuids.description: List of GUIDs that failed to update

items.description: List of GUIDs that failed to update

misconfiguredDoors.description: List of door names that are assigned to multiple Rhombus locations

items.description: List of door names that are assigned to multiple Rhombus locations
